scripts.start:backend: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && concurrently "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run serve:frontend"
scripts.serve:frontend: npm run build --prefix frontend && node backend/server.js
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.build:backend: npm install --prefix backend && echo 'Backend build not needed'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Deploying both frontend and backend'
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
